    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    API_AhlyBank
    Represents an integration with the Ahly Bank API.
    API_BankMisr
    Represents an integration with the Bank Misr API.
    API_HSBC
    Represents an integration with HSBC Bank's system.
    Asset
    Represents an asset with its details, including name, type, purchase information, quantity, and goals associated with it.
    AuthController
    The AuthController class manages user authentication processes including sign-up, login, and input validation.
    BankAccount
    Represents a bank account associated with a card, containing information such as card number, holder name, expiry date, CVV, OTP, and bank name.
    BankRepo
    BankRepo is responsible for loading and managing the list of bank names stored in a file.
    BanksAPIs_Account
    Interface for bank API integrations.
    DashboardController
    The DashboardController class manages the main dashboard interface after a user successfully logs in.
    Goal
    Represents a goal associated with an asset.
    HelperFunc
    Utility class that provides helper functions for input validation and user interaction.
    IntegerationPanel
    This class represents the integration panel where a user can connect to different bank and stock accounts.
    InvestDashBoardPanel
    The InvestDashBoardPanel class provides the functionality for managing assets.
    Main
    The Main class serves as the entry point for the application.
    Panel
    Interface representing a Panel in the application.
    Person
    Represents a person with a username, name, password, and email.
    StockAccount
    Represents a stock account.
    StockRepo
    StockRepo is a placeholder class for managing and retrieving stock data.
    StocksAPIs_Account
    Interface for stock API integrations.
    User
    Represents a user with a set of bank accounts, stock accounts, and assets.
    UserRepo
    UserRepo is a repository class that manages a collection of User objects.
    ZaketPanel
    ZaketPanel is responsible for managing the Zakat-related operations and providing the user interface for zakat calculation, halal investments, and tax complaint handling.
